[![houston13|500x500](upload://8CTf5oZJiu8sltBSYFpOdrX1jjr.jpeg)](https://soundcloud.com/dr-aquaman/houston13)
With these elements, I've tried to build a soundscape in which you can mentally lose in space...
**Melodic Sounds** Blanket (Euphoric Memories) Cluster (Standard Deviation) Haunt (Panic Attack) Kilobyte (Game Waves) Ooze (Retrofit)
**Drums** Appetite Grave Greed
